events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position highlighting extensive experience in cloud infrastructure.
Application reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to the focus on software development and DevOps expertise.
Recruiter John Smith assigned to handle the candidate's application and coordinate upcoming interview stages.
Initial phone screening conducted to assess candidate’s technical background and cultural fit with the engineering team.
Candidate responded promptly confirming availability for technical interviews and expressed strong enthusiasm for the role.
Technical interview with lead engineer scheduled for May 6 at 2 PM to evaluate candidate’s coding and system design skills.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and understanding of DevOps best practices.
HR interview arranged for May 9 to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate’s career goals.
